DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the effects of Azor (a combination of amlodipine and olmesartan) with Hyzaar ( a combination of losartan and hydrochlorothiazide) on the thin lining on the inside of blood vessels. These cells help keep blood vessels healthy and blood pressure normal.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Endothelial Function and Biomarkers in African Americans (AA) With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Participants must be 18-75 years of age, African American, and have a combination of high blood pressure, insulin resistance (Type 2 Diabetes), low HDL cholesterol levels or obesity.
DOC.mesh_term: Amlodipine Besylate, Olmesartan Medoxomil Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: African American Hypertension and one of the following: Fasting glucose > 100 mg/dl HgA1C> 6.0 % Plasma triglycerides >150 HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dl in men or < 50 mg/dl in women History of Heart failure use of insulin nondominant arm circ > 50 cm.
